texts.name: Kraas
texts.biography: Kraas was born in solitude, and once he appeared before the king of the deep, self-nurtured and experienced, he was granted a position of power over his cephalopod relatives.

specialty.description: Increases Speed of any Octopuses or Ferocious Octopuses by 1 and their Attack and Defense skills by 5% for every 4 levels (rounded up)
specialty.name: Octopuses
